title: The link to the Rails-App from tthe RGSOC website
body_html: In the RGSOC website (https://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) there should be direct link/button to go to the "Rails Team APP" (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) to improve user experience as it's difficult for the user to find the site for "Rails Team App".
body_text: In the RGSOC website (https://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) there should be direct link/button to go to the "Rails Team APP" (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) to improve user experience as it's difficult for the user to find the site for "Rails Team App".
body: In the RGSOC website (https://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) there should be direct link/button to go to the "Rails Team APP" (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/) to improve user experience as it's difficult for the user to find the site for "Rails Team App".
